document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c8b4f0">dying </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c8b4f0">tiger </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c8b4f0">moaned </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94b8f8">drink </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: A dying tiger moaned for drink
